tasks.title: Convert TradingView RSI implementation
tasks.description: Find RSI implementation from TradingView. Convert to Python using pandas/numpy. Save to output/indicators/converted/rsi/ with full class implementation, tests, and documentation.

tasks.title: Recreate SuperTrend indicator in Python
tasks.description: Find SuperTrend PineScript source using mcp_exa_web_search_exa. Convert to Python class in output/indicators/converted/supertrend/. Include: supertrend.py (class with calculate() and get_signal()), test_supertrend.py (unit tests), README.md (usage docs).
